product_details.description: OPTIMUM NUTRITION'S GOLD STANDARD 100% Whey uses pure Whey Protein Isolates as the primary ingredient. Combined with ultra-filtered whey protein concentrate, each serving provides 24 grams of all-whey protein and 5.5 grams of naturally occurring Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs) which are prized by athletes for their muscle building qualities. With more than 20 tempting flavors to choose from, ON GOLD STANDARD 100% Whey gives you plenty of ways to keep workout recovery interesting. Search "ON Apparel TRUE STRENGTH" to see our new ON clothing line! Gold Standard 100% Whey Protein: 24 grams of blended protein consisting of whey protein isolate, whey protein concentrate, and whey peptides to support lean muscle mass - they don't call it the Gold Standard of quality for nothing 5.5 grams of naturally occurring branched chain amino acids (BCAAs) and 11 grams of naturally occurring essential amino acids (EAAs) per serving to support muscle recovery Anytime formula: great before or after exercise, between meals, with a meal, or any time of day when you need extra protein Banned substance tested and the highest quality control measures so you feel comfortable and confident consuming the product Optimum Nutrition is the World's #1 Sports Nutrition Brand* *Source Euromonitor International Limited; Consumer Health 2023 Edition, Sports Nutrition category, % retail value shares, 2022 data Brand - Optimum Nutrition ** Flavor - Extreme Milk Chocolate ** Servings per Container - 71 ** Item Weight - 5 Pounds ** Material Type Free - Gluten Free **

banner_details:
The banner design showcases a modern, premium aesthetic centered around a sports supplement product. The background uses a deep gradient with subtle line art and gold geometric layers for a luxurious, scientific feel. A central image of the product container dominates the composition, establishing brand prominence. Bright, bold typography highlights the primary claims with the `heading` and `subheading` text layers. Below the product, the `tagline` and `description` layers emphasize flavor and nutritional benefits. The `price` layer is presented in bold white, creating a strong CTA. A gold button with black text (`cta_background` and `cta`) invites immediate action.

Color Palette:
- Black: #000000
- Charcoal: #1a1a1a
- Gold: #d4af37
- Cream Gold: #f9d775
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image utilizes a bold and high-contrast color palette to emphasize strength and premium quality. Dominant colors include matte black (#1B1B1B) for the container, creating a sleek, professional backdrop. Gold (#CFA557) is used for the “Gold Standard” label, adding a touch of luxury and importance. Creamy beige (#EDE6D8) makes the product name highly legible and eye-catching. Bright red (#D72829) highlights servings and flavor, drawing immediate attention. Subtle gradients and diagonal striping in black-gray tones blend the design, while strategic color contrast highlights key text and ensures brand visibility. This palette suits fitness-focused and performance-driven advertising themes.
